entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 03:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -2.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
